text:
Hi, I have a workflow triggered on a custom object (`shipment`) and want to send an email including some special information (`shipment items`) formatted as a HTML table. I do already have an email-template and created a custom module (with *programmable content* enabled). However, the problem is how can I access the custom object within this custom module? Is there a way to pass it as a parameter within the email template?

Another option would be to add some HubL-Code to the email template but this is not allowed via the HTML module? Any suggestions?
Another thing, using `crm_associations` within the module to get all shipments of the current contact is no real option, because a contact can get many shipments over time.
